trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Katy
There were no other sightings in Katy on or around March 20th 2005
divs: sighting detailssighting report: it was march 17, 2005 at @7:00 p.m. i was driving home from work and traveling west on westheimer. i was @1\4 mile from the intersection of highway 6. at this intersetion is a mall called west oaks mall. looking above and beyond the mall i saw some lights. one in particular was bright and and also had a blinking light. it seemed to stay in one spot and then it moved a little. this is what initially caught my attention. then, all of a sudden, i saw a black triangular object which was in the same vicinity but on the side of the blinking craft that i was on. this black triangular craft or ufo was many, many times bigger than this other blinking craft. also, i began to notice a lot of other brightly lit craft with blinking lights. i believe that these were either planes and or helicopters. it occurred to me that these lit up and blinking craft (probably planes and or helicopters were possibly trying to observe this black triangular craft). the black triangular craft was moving towards the direction of traffic that i was caught up in trying to get home. it was moving slowly but steadily towards my direction. i kept thinking i must be seeing things and continually tried to open my eyes larger to make sure i was seeing clearly. this triangular object seemed to intentionally move right above the low lying clouds. the clouds were thin enough to be able to clearly see the dark triangle shape of the object. the rest of the sky was clear. it was in a perfect form of a triangle and all sides were equal in size. there were no lights and i heard no noise. the craft eventually went past my car. this, i believe, was about 3-5 minutes in total. i was on my cell phone talking to a close friend during this entire event. i told her that i had to turn my car back in the other direction so that i could find a parking lot to park my car and get out and continue to observe this object. she decided to get off the phone with me. i turned my car around and found a parking lot. by the time i got out, it had become darker and i was no longer able to see the object. i was amazed and frustrated at how quickly it got darker. i reported this to the harris county sheriff s department and asked them who i could call to report this other than them. they told me that there were some life flight helicopters doing practice landings in that area. i assured them that this was in no way a helicopter that i was calling them to report. due to the response that they gave me, i have to wonder if they had already gotten reports similar to mine. i also wonder if in fact the helicopters that i was seeing were really practicing life flight landings or if this was simply what they were telling people. it may be that they really were practicing and the triangular object was a separate event. maybe the triangular object was observing the helicopters practicing life flight landings or maybe not. we will probably never know. i did notice that after the triangular object was out of my sight, there were many other crafts within a 5 mile radius (as i traveled home) flying around the area. one in particular seemed to be circling close to the path of the triangular object. my goal was to find out if anyone else saw this same triangular object in this area and around the same time. i was given the number of nasa but decided that i didn t trust contacting the government. i just learned about your site and hope that someone will contact me to investigate this further and will also let me know if there have been any other reports on this.
